name: Project04 Phieford Nash
description:
Feature#1: Cube Animation- click and hold “A” button and move mouse position

Feature#2: Multi Cube Animation- click and hold “W” button and move mouse position

Feature#3: Shapes Animation- click and hold “D” button and move mouse position

Feature#4: Clock-Tells real time in game space 

Feature#5: Background- Background changes as time goes on

Feature#6: Clear Button- Click on button to clear painting

Feature#7: Preview-Displays the color preview

Feature#8: Destroy-Click button to destroy the painting at a certain time by adjusting the slider

Feature#9: Play-Click button to resume the animation of the paintings

Feature#10: Pause-Click button to stop the animations of the paintings
